original_title: Monster Bang 5: Pokin' in the Boys Room
overview: With the release of Monster Bang #5: Pokin' in the Boys Room, Raging Stallion has pushed the envelope like never before in order to bring you the hottest sex ever captured on film. Cumming in at over two and a half hours long, with a cast of huge stars and 5 never-before-filmed studs, Pokin' presents a twisted tale that is certain to pop your cork!
title: Monster Bang 5: Pokin' in the Boys Room
